invocations.description: Checks if you have the current hotkeys binded on functions keyboard.
invocations.ex:
if not isbinded('exura', 'exura gran', 'exura vita') then
	messagebox('Error', 'Couldn't find hotkey binded for spells: exura, exura gran or exura vita')
end
invocations.exDescription: Will pop out a window with the error if the spells exura, exura gran or exura vita couldn't be found on your hotkeys.

invocations.description: Checks if you have the current hotkeys binded on functions keyboard.
invocations.ex:
if not isbinded({'exura', 'automatic'}, {'avalanche rune', 'crosshair'}) then
	messagebox('Error', 'Couldn't find hotkey binded for spells: exura, or for items: avalanche rune.')
end
invocations.exDescription: Will pop out a window with the error if the spell exura or avalanche rune couldn't be found on your hotkeys, based on the bind type given.
